name: Memory-Map QuickChart File
summary: Learn about .QCT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The QCT file format is the main file type associated with Memory-Map. QCT files may be saved and opened using Memory-Map. Other programs, including Psyberia AlpineQuest, can also be used to open QCT files. Memory-Map is available for Windows, macOS, Android, and iOS.
NOTE: QCT maps are typically located in the C:Maps or C:Maps_<version> folder in Windows.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
